data.name: 俠之道(PathOfWuxia) OST
data.detailed_description:
This OST currently contains 41 tracks of game music, including bonus tracks that can only be found in this album.
Each track is provided with two formats: mp3 and lossless wav.
The OST also includes a PDF Ebook written in Chinese, introducing the content of the tracks, the creative process of the scoring team, and tips about scoring for video games.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Storage: 100 MB available space
  • Storage (high-quality audio): Additional 600 MB available space
